'''''Guiding Wind''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 40 [[Seelie]] in [[Mondstadt]] to their Seelie Courts (excludes the [[Dragonspine]] area).
